title: AlwaysShowPanelTabs Setting Not Respected at Application Launch
author: jcefoli
body_snippet:
### Description
The AlwaysShowPanelTabs setting in mRemoteNG is not properly applied when the application starts up. Users must manually re-toggle the setting in the options dialog for it to take effect, even though the setting appears to be saved correctly.

### Steps to Reproduce

1. Open mRemoteNG
1. Go to Tools ΓåÆ Options ΓåÆ Tabs & Panels
1. Check or uncheck "Always show panel tabs"
1. Click OK to save settings
